column5: Hi all, it has been a long time since I have been on here (not sure why, but feels good to be checking in).  Let me start by saying Happy New Year to everyone! I am looking for recommendation on a family cottage resort within a few hours of Toronto.  It would be myself and my 3 boys (13, 11 and 9).  Some of things I am ideally looking for are: Thanks in advance for your help!

Pete good to hear from you! We have gone to Cadigans Camp on Pigeon Lake a number of times. Kids catch a million panfish off the docks and there is a nice beach. The cottages aren't the greatest, but if you are low maintenance should be fine with them.
Lakeline Lodge and Marina http://lakelinelodge.com/ Charleston Lake, ON
Check with Will (AKA young_one and then changed names) for Curtis Point Lodge on Rice Lake to see what they have to offer.  Knowing Will, he will tell you were to fish for the boys.
We rented a cottage on Cecebe and I drove to Tornados for a 30min flight on his DHC-2 Beaver with my daughters.  Great guy and an impressive lodge!
